channel.title: [508/525] Tormented Demons fully working
channel.description:
[SIZE="5"][B][U]I DONT NOT GIVE PERMISSION TO ANYONE TO RELEASE THIS ON ANY OTHER FORUMS, MY google ACCOUNT IS ROWAN112, MY MOPARSCAPE ACCOUNT IS ROWAN092001, AND MY RUNE3-SERVER ACCOUNT IS ROWAN112 SO IF I SEE ANYONE RELEASING MY WORK I WILL REPORT THEM. ALSO I WILL NEVER DELETE ANY OF MY RELEASES[/SIZE][/U][/B]
go into
[QUOTE]Class68_Sub13_Sub11[/QUOTE] now in there look for this
[QUOTE]Class93.aClass98_1662.method1568(class80, 104, (long) i);[/QUOTE]
add under there [QUOTE]if(i == 9000) { //NPC id TD melee prayer class80.aRSString_1466 = Class112.method1668(43, "Tormented demon");//Name class80.anInt1444 = 450;//combat level class80.aBoolean1438 = true;//show yellow dot? class80.anInt1439 = 0;//Set Headicon ID class80.aBoolean1433 = true;//allow rightclicking? class80.aRSStringArray1432[1] = Class112.method1668(43, "Attack"); //class80.anInt1461 = 50;//resize width //class80.anInt1416 = 50;//resize height class80.anInt1409 = 10921;//stand animation class80.anInt1440 = 10920;//walk animation class80.anIntArray1454 = new int[1];//model count class80.anIntArray1454[0] = 44733;//model file } if(i == 9001) { //NPC id TD range prayer class80.aRSString_1466 = Class112.method1668(43, "Tormented demon");//Name class80.anInt1444 = 450;//combat level class80.aBoolean1438 = true;//show yellow dot? class80.anInt1439 = 1;//Set Headicon ID class80.aBoolean1433 = true;//allow rightclicking? class80.aRSStringArray1432[1] = Class112.method1668(43, "Attack"); //class80.anInt1461 = 50;//resize width //class80.anInt1416 = 50;//resize height class80.anInt1409 = 10921;//stand animation class80.anInt1440 = 10920;//walk animation class80.anIntArray1454 = new int[1];//model count class80.anIntArray1454[0] = 44733;//model file } if(i == 9002) { //NPC id TD mage prayer class80.aRSString_1466 = Class112.method1668(43, "Tormented demon");//Name class80.anInt1444 = 450;//combat level class80.aBoolean1438 = true;//show yellow dot? class80.anInt1439 = 2;//Set Headicon ID class80.aBoolean1433 = true;//allow rightclicking? class80.aRSStringArray1432[1] = Class112.method1668(43, "Attack"); //class80.anInt1461 = 50;//resize width //class80.anInt1416 = 50;//resize height class80.anInt1409 = 10921;//stand animation class80.anInt1440 = 10920;//walk animation class80.anIntArray1454 = new int[1];//model count class80.anIntArray1454[0] = 44733;//model file } [/QUOTE] then go into the model folder and add this .Dat [url=http://uppit.com/v/K4EBIE0Z]http://uppit.com/v/K4EBIE0Z[/url]
then run client and server, btw you can change the npc id, but dont use the original tormented demon's npc id or you cant login.
also go into engine.java in your source and search for [QUOTE]public static int maxListedNPCs[/QUOTE] change the whole thing to [QUOTE]public static int maxListedNPCs = 10000;[/QUOTE] so the tormented demon is spawnable
[U][B]GFX and Anims[/B][/U] [QUOTE]anims n gfx Melee GFX =1886 Melee Anim = 10922 Another Melee Anim = 10919
Range anim = 10918 Range Projectile = 1884
Mage Anim = 10917 Mage Projectile = 1885
Shield GFX = 1885 "i think"[/QUOTE]
also the gfx, emote and stuff like that works on the tormented demon and also does anyone know how to add walking emote on the client too, so i havnt got to add it on server side
There i got all TD working [B][U]Pictures[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu54/rowan092001/allTD.jpg[/img]

item.dc:creator: @man_killerx man_killerx
item.description:
@man_killerx wrote:

Really, You think those T.O.S Actually keep them away? Lol. Those T.O.S You see are nothing but a bluff. It would be like me making a T.O.S Saying,

1.) You can’t be black to enter this site.
2.) You can’t know/work with anyone that is black.

See the point? It would be racist to tell someone they can’t enter a site just because who they are, and who they work for. Also Jagex has lawers out the ass.

item.title: [508/525] Tormented Demons fully working
item.dc:creator: @rowan092001 rowan092001
item.description:
@rowan092001 wrote:

[SIZE=“5”]I DONT NOT GIVE PERMISSION TO ANYONE TO RELEASE THIS ON ANY OTHER FORUMS, MY google ACCOUNT IS ROWAN112, MY MOPARSCAPE ACCOUNT IS ROWAN092001, AND MY RUNE3-SERVER ACCOUNT IS ROWAN112 SO IF I SEE ANYONE RELEASING MY WORK I WILL REPORT THEM. ALSO I WILL NEVER DELETE ANY OF MY RELEASES[/SIZE]

go into

Class68_Sub13_Sub11

now in there look for this

Class93.aClass98_1662.method1568(class80, 104, (long) i);

add under there

[QUOTE]if(i == 9000) { //NPC id TD melee prayer
class80.aRSString_1466 = Class112.method1668(43, “Tormented demon”);//Name
class80.anInt1444 = 450;//combat level
class80.aBoolean1438 = true;//show yellow dot?
class80.anInt1439 = 0;//Set Headicon ID
class80.aBoolean1433 = true;//allow rightclicking?
class80.aRSStringArray1432[1] = Class112.method1668(43, “Attack”);
//class80.anInt1461 = 50;//resize width
//class80.anInt1416 = 50;//resize height
class80.anInt1409 = 10921;//stand animation
class80.anInt1440 = 10920;//walk animation
class80.anIntArray1454 = new int[1];//model count
class80.anIntArray1454[0] = 44733;//model file
}
if(i == 9001) { //NPC id TD range prayer
class80.aRSString_1466 = Class112.method1668(43, “Tormented demon”);//Name
class80.anInt1444 = 450;//combat level
class80.aBoolean1438 = true;//show yellow dot?
class80.anInt1439 = 1;//Set Headicon ID
class80.aBoolean1433 = true;//allow rightclicking?
class80.aRSStringArray1432[1] = Class112.method1668(43, “Attack”);
//class80.anInt1461 = 50;//resize width
//class80.anInt1416 = 50;//resize height
class80.anInt1409 = 10921;//stand animation
class80.anInt1440 = 10920;//walk animation
class80.anIntArray1454 = new int[1];//model count
class80.anIntArray1454[0] = 44733;//model file
}
if(i == 9002) { //NPC id TD mage prayer
class80.aRSString_1466 = Class112.method1668(43, “Tormented demon”);//Name
class80.anInt1444 = 450;//combat level
class80.aBoolean1438 = true;//show yellow dot?
class80.anInt1439 = 2;//Set Headicon ID
class80.aBoolean1433 = true;//allow rightclicking?
class80.aRSStringArray1432[1] = Class112.method1668(43, “Attack”);
//class80.anInt1461 = 50;//resize width
//class80.anInt1416 = 50;//resize height
class80.anInt1409 = 10921;//stand animation
class80.anInt1440 = 10920;//walk animation
class80.anIntArray1454 = new int[1];//model count
class80.anIntArray1454[0] = 44733;//model file
}
[/QUOTE]
then go into the model folder and add this .Dat
http://uppit.com/v/K4EBIE0Z

then run client and server, btw you can change the npc id, but dont use the original tormented demon’s npc id or you cant login.

also go into engine.java in your source
and search for

public static int maxListedNPCs

change the whole thing to

public static int maxListedNPCs = 10000;

so the tormented demon is spawnable

GFX and Anims

[QUOTE]anims n gfx
Melee GFX =1886
Melee Anim = 10922
Another
Melee Anim = 10919

Range anim = 10918
Range Projectile = 1884

Mage Anim = 10917
Mage Projectile = 1885

Shield GFX = 1885 “i think”[/QUOTE]

also the gfx, emote and stuff like that works on the tormented demon
and also does anyone know how to add walking emote on the client too, so i havnt got to add it on server side

There i got all TD working
Pictures

allTD.jpg782×540

Read full topic
